```diff
- 
+ // -----
+ // <copyright file="MemoComponent.tsx" company="ResidenceManager">
+ // Copyright (c) ResidenceManager. All rights reserved.
+ // </copyright>
+ // -----
+ // Purpose: React.memo kullanarak gereksiz render'larƒ± √∂nleyen bile≈üen
+ // Dependencies: React
+ // Usage: Performans optimizasyonu i√ßin bile≈üenleri memo ile sarmalamak
+ // Author: Claude
+ // Created: 2023-07-18
+ // Modified: 2023-07-18
+ // -----
+ 
+ import React, { ComponentType, memo } from 'react';
+ 
+ /**
+  * √ñzel prop e≈üitlik kontrol√º i√ßin tip tanƒ±mƒ±
+  */
+ type EqualityFn<P> = (prevProps: Readonly<P>, nextProps: Readonly<P>) => boolean;
+ 
+ /**
+  * Component'i React.memo ile sarmalayan helper fonksiyon
+  * @param Component Memoize edilecek komponent
+  * @param propsAreEqual √ñzel e≈üitlik kontrol√º fonksiyonu (opsiyonel)
+  * @returns Memoize edilmi≈ü komponent
+  */
+ export function memoize<P extends object>(
+   Component: ComponentType<P>,
+   propsAreEqual?: EqualityFn<P>
+ ): React.MemoExoticComponent<ComponentType<P>> {
+   return memo(Component, propsAreEqual);
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Bile≈üen prop'larƒ±nƒ±n derin kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±rmasƒ±nƒ± yapar
+  * @param prevProps √ñnceki prop'lar
+  * @param nextProps Yeni prop'lar
+  * @returns Prop'larƒ±n e≈üit olup olmadƒ±ƒüƒ±
+  */
+ export function deepPropsComparison<P extends object>(
+   prevProps: Readonly<P>,
+   nextProps: Readonly<P>
+ ): boolean {
+   function isEqual(obj1: any, obj2: any): boolean {
+     if (obj1 === obj2) return true;
+     
+     // Null/undefined kontrol√º
+     if (obj1 == null || obj2 == null) return obj1 === obj2;
+     
+     // Tip kontrol√º
+     if (typeof obj1 !== typeof obj2) return false;
+     
+     // Primitive deƒüerler i√ßin
+     if (typeof obj1 !== 'object') return obj1 === obj2;
+     
+     // Array kontrol√º
+     if (Array.isArray(obj1) && Array.isArray(obj2)) {
+       if (obj1.length !== obj2.length) return false;
+       
+       for (let i = 0; i < obj1.length; i++) {
+         if (!isEqual(obj1[i], obj2[i])) return false;
+       }
+       
+       return true;
+     }
+     
+     // Object kontrol√º
+     if (Array.isArray(obj1) !== Array.isArray(obj2)) return false;
+     
+     const keys1 = Object.keys(obj1);
+     const keys2 = Object.keys(obj2);
+     
+     if (keys1.length !== keys2.length) return false;
+     
+     return keys1.every(key => 
+       Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj2, key) && 
+       isEqual(obj1[key], obj2[key])
+     );
+   }
+   
+   return isEqual(prevProps, nextProps);
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Belirli prop'larƒ± hari√ß tutarak kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±rma yapan fonksiyon
+  * @param excludeProps Kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±rmadan hari√ß tutulacak prop isimleri
+  * @returns Kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±rma fonksiyonu
+  */
+ export function propsComparisonExcept<P extends object>(
+   excludeProps: (keyof P)[]
+ ): EqualityFn<P> {
+   return (prevProps, nextProps) => {
+     const relevantPrevProps: Partial<P> = {};
+     const relevantNextProps: Partial<P> = {};
+     
+     Object.keys(prevProps).forEach(key => {
+       if (!excludeProps.includes(key as keyof P)) {
+         relevantPrevProps[key as keyof P] = prevProps[key as keyof P];
+       }
+     });
+     
+     Object.keys(nextProps).forEach(key => {
+       if (!excludeProps.includes(key as keyof P)) {
+         relevantNextProps[key as keyof P] = nextProps[key as keyof P];
+       }
+     });
+     
+     return deepPropsComparison(relevantPrevProps as P, relevantNextProps as P);
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Sadece belirli prop'lar deƒüi≈ütiƒüinde render yapan kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±rma fonksiyonu
+  * @param includeProps Sadece bu prop'lar kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±rƒ±lacak
+  * @returns Kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±rma fonksiyonu
+  */
+ export function propsComparisonOnly<P extends object>(
+   includeProps: (keyof P)[]
+ ): EqualityFn<P> {
+   return (prevProps, nextProps) => {
+     for (const prop of includeProps) {
+       if (!deepPropsComparison(prevProps[prop], nextProps[prop])) {
+         return false;
+       }
+     }
+     return true;
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * MemoComponent - Bir bile≈üeni React.memo ile sarmalar
+  */
+ const MemoComponent = {
+   memoize,
+   deepPropsComparison,
+   propsComparisonExcept,
+   propsComparisonOnly,
+ };
+ 
+ export default MemoComponent; 
```

```diff
+ 
+ /**
+  * Performance API kullanƒ±labilir mi diye kontrol eder
+  */
+ export const isPerformanceSupported = (): boolean => {
+   return typeof window !== 'undefined' && 
+          window.performance !== undefined && 
+          window.performance.timing !== undefined;
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Web Vitals deƒüerlerini √∂l√ßer ve raporlar
+  */
+ export const measureWebVitals = (): Promise<Partial<PerformanceMetrics>> => {
+   return new Promise((resolve) => {
+     if (!isPerformanceSupported()) {
+       resolve({});
+       return;
+     }
+     
+     // Sayfa y√ºklendikten sonra √∂l√ß√ºmleri yapacaƒüƒ±z
+     window.addEventListener('load', () => {
+       // Biraz bekleyerek t√ºm metriklerin √∂l√ß√ºlmesini saƒülƒ±yoruz
+       setTimeout(() => {
+         const metrics: Partial<PerformanceMetrics> = {};
+         const perfEntries = window.performance.getEntriesByType('navigation');
+         
+         if (perfEntries.length > 0 && perfEntries[0] instanceof PerformanceNavigationTiming) {
+           const navigationEntry = perfEntries[0] as PerformanceNavigationTiming;
+           
+           metrics.timeToFirstByte = navigationEntry.responseStart;
+           metrics.loadTime = navigationEntry.loadEventEnd - navigationEntry.startTime;
+           metrics.domContentLoaded = navigationEntry.domContentLoadedEventEnd - navigationEntry.startTime;
+         }
+         
+         // First Paint ve First Contentful Paint
+         const paintEntries = window.performance.getEntriesByType('paint');
+         
+         paintEntries.forEach((entry) => {
+           if (entry.name === 'first-paint') {
+             metrics.firstPaint = entry.startTime;
+           } else if (entry.name === 'first-contentful-paint') {
+             metrics.firstContentfulPaint = entry.startTime;
+           }
+         });
+         
+         // Resource metriklerini toplama
+         const resourceEntries = window.performance.getEntriesByType('resource');
+         const resourceLoadTimes: Record<string, number> = {};
+         
+         resourceEntries.forEach((entry) => {
+           const url = entry.name.split('/').pop() || entry.name;
+           resourceLoadTimes[url] = entry.duration;
+         });
+         
+         metrics.resourceLoadTimes = resourceLoadTimes;
+         
+         // Bellek kullanƒ±mƒ± (Chrome'da kullanƒ±labilir)
+         if (window.performance.memory) {
+           metrics.memoryUsage = {
+             jsHeapSizeLimit: window.performance.memory.jsHeapSizeLimit,
+             totalJSHeapSize: window.performance.memory.totalJSHeapSize,
+             usedJSHeapSize: window.performance.memory.usedJSHeapSize,
+           };
+         }
+         
+         resolve(metrics);
+       }, 500);
+     });
+   });
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Fonksiyon √ßalƒ±≈üma s√ºresini √∂l√ßer
+  * @param fn √ñl√ß√ºlecek fonksiyon
+  * @param args Fonksiyon arg√ºmanlarƒ±
+  * @returns Fonksiyon sonucu ve √ßalƒ±≈üma s√ºresi
+  */
+ export const measureFunctionExecutionTime = <T extends any[], R>(
+   fn: (...args: T) => R,
+   ...args: T
+ ): { result: R; executionTime: number } => {
+   const startTime = performance.now();
+   const result = fn(...args);
+   const endTime = performance.now();
+   
+   return {
+     result,
+     executionTime: endTime - startTime,
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * React bile≈üeni render s√ºresini √∂l√ßer
+  * @param componentName Bile≈üen adƒ±
+  * @returns Start ve stop fonksiyonlarƒ±
+  */
+ export const measureComponentRenderTime = (componentName: string) => {
+   const markStart = `${componentName}_render_start`;
+   const markEnd = `${componentName}_render_end`;
+   
+   return {
+     start: () => {
+       if (isPerformanceSupported()) {
+         performance.mark(markStart);
+       }
+     },
+     stop: (): number | undefined => {
+       if (isPerformanceSupported()) {
+         performance.mark(markEnd);
+         performance.measure(
+           `${componentName}_render_duration`,
+           markStart,
+           markEnd
+         );
+         
+         const measures = performance.getEntriesByName(
+           `${componentName}_render_duration`
+         );
+         
+         if (measures.length > 0) {
+           return measures[0].duration;
+         }
+       }
+       
+       return undefined;
+     },
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Performans verilerini loglama
+  * @param metricName Metrik adƒ±
+  * @param value Metrik deƒüeri
+  */
+ export const logPerformanceMetric = (metricName: string, value: number): void => {
+   console.log(`[Performance] ${metricName}: ${value.toFixed(2)}ms`);
+   
+   // Burada ayrƒ±ca analytics servisine de g√∂nderebiliriz
+   // sendToAnalyticsService(metricName, value);
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Slow render'larƒ± tespit etmek i√ßin bir HOC
+  * @param threshold E≈üik deƒüer (ms)
+  * @returns Higher-Order Component
+  */
+ export const detectSlowRenders = (threshold: number = 16) => {
+   return <P extends object>(Component: React.ComponentType<P>) => {
+     const ComponentName = Component.displayName || Component.name || 'Component';
+     
+     const WrappedComponent: React.FC<P> = (props) => {
+       React.useEffect(() => {
+         const measure = measureComponentRenderTime(ComponentName);
+         measure.start();
+         
+         return () => {
+           const duration = measure.stop();
+           if (duration && duration > threshold) {
+             console.warn(
+               `[SlowRender] ${ComponentName} took ${duration.toFixed(2)}ms to render (threshold: ${threshold}ms)`
+             );
+           }
+         };
+       }, []);
+       
+       return <Component {...props} />;
+     };
+     
+     WrappedComponent.displayName = `DetectSlowRenders(${ComponentName})`;
+     
+     return WrappedComponent;
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Performance monitor hook
+  * @returns Performance metrikleri ve √∂l√ß√ºm fonksiyonlarƒ±
+  */
+ export const usePerformanceMonitor = () => {
+   const [metrics, setMetrics] = React.useState<Partial<PerformanceMetrics>>({});
+   
+   const collectMetrics = React.useCallback(async () => {
+     const newMetrics = await measureWebVitals();
+     setMetrics(newMetrics);
+   }, []);
+   
+   React.useEffect(() => {
+     collectMetrics();
+   }, [collectMetrics]);
+   
+   return {
+     metrics,
+     refreshMetrics: collectMetrics,
+     measureFunction: measureFunctionExecutionTime,
+     detectSlowRenders,
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ export default {
+   measureWebVitals,
+   measureFunctionExecutionTime,
+   measureComponentRenderTime,
+   logPerformanceMetric,
+   detectSlowRenders,
+   usePerformanceMonitor,
+   isPerformanceSupported,
+ }; 
```

```diff
+ /**

+  */
+ const OptimizedImage: React.FC<OptimizedImageProps> = ({

+   const [shouldLoad, setShouldLoad] = useState(!lazy);
+   const imgRef = useRef<HTMLImageElement>(null);

+   // Check if browser supports WebP format

+   
+   useEffect(() => {

+       try {
+         const webPCheck = document.createElement('canvas');
+         if (webPCheck.getContext && webPCheck.getContext('2d')) {
+           const canvasContext = webPCheck.getContext('2d')!;
+           const result = canvasContext.fillText('webp test', 0, 0);
+           const blob = await new Promise<Blob | null>((resolve) => {
+             webPCheck.toBlob((b) => resolve(b), 'image/webp');

+     };

+     checkWebPSupport();

+   useEffect(() => {

+     }

+     };
+   }, [lazy, threshold]);
+
```

Based on the analysis, here are the technical issues I've identified in the project:

## 1. Missing Dependencies

Several important libraries used in components are not properly installed in the project:

   ```typescript

   import { LocalizationProvider } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/LocalizationProvider';
   import { AdapterDateFns } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/AdapterDateFns';
   ```

3. **notistack**: Used for snackbar notifications in multiple components
   ```typescript
   import { useSnackbar } from 'notistack';
   ```

4. **Version mismatch**: Project uses both React Query and Tanstack Query
   ```typescript
   // In components:
   import { useQuery, useMutation } from 'react-query';
   
   // In package.json:
   "@tanstack/react-query": "^4.36.1",
   ```

## 2. Missing Type Definitions

Multiple components have TypeScript errors due to implicit any types:

```typescript

renderCell: (params) => { // Parameter 'params' implicitly has an 'any' type
```

## 3. Non-existent API Services and Hooks

Components are importing from files that don't exist in the project:

1. **Missing API service**:

   But the only file in the api directory is `axiosConfig.ts`

2. **Missing hook**:

   But this file doesn't exist in the hooks directory

## 4. Inconsistent Component Structure

There's inconsistent structure in the components:

1. Both functional components and React.FC typing are mixed throughout the codebase
2. Some components have proper type definitions while others use implicit typing

## 5. Path Alias Configuration vs Actual Usage

The tsconfig.json has path aliases configured:

```json
"paths": {
  "@/*": ["*"],
  "@components/*": ["components/*"],
  // ...many others
}
```

But components are using relative imports instead:

```typescript
import { useAuth } from '../../../hooks/useAuth';
```

## 6. Styling Inconsistencies

The theme.ts file includes responsive styles for MuiDataGrid, but this component isn't available without the missing @mui/x-data-grid package.

## 7. Mock Data Usage

Components are using hard-coded mock data instead of real API calls, despite having API implementation imports:

```typescript
const MOCK_ANNOUNCEMENTS: Announcement[] = [
  // ...
];
```

This suggests the frontend is in development and not yet properly integrated with the backend.

## 8. Type Safety Issues

Missing proper TypeScript type safety in several areas:

```typescript
color={color as any} // Using 'any' type cast

// Function parameters without type definitions
onChange={(newValue) => field.onChange(newValue)} // Parameter 'newValue' implicitly has an 'any' type
```

## Recommendations:

1. **Install missing dependencies**:
   ```bash
   npm install @mui/x-data-grid @mui/x-date-pickers notistack date-fns
   ```

2. **Standardize API usage**:
   - Migrate all React Query imports to use @tanstack/react-query
   - Create missing API services like announcementService.ts

3. **Fix type definitions**:
   - Add proper type interfaces for all function parameters
   - Use consistent component typing (React.FC or function components)

4. **Use path aliases**:
   - Replace relative imports with configured path aliases 
   - Example: `import { useAuth } from '@hooks/useAuth';`

5. **Add missing hooks and services**:
   - Create the useAuth hook in the hooks directory
   - Add proper API services for data fetching

6. **Fix linting and compiler errors**:
   - Run `npm run lint:fix` to fix automated issues
   - Address remaining TypeScript errors manually

7. **Implement proper error handling**:
   - Add error states for API calls
   - Implement proper loading indicators

These changes will significantly improve the technical coherence and stability of the codebase.

```diff
- 
+ // -----
+ // <copyright file="useAuth.ts" company="ResidenceManager">
+ // Copyright (c) ResidenceManager. All rights reserved.
+ // </copyright>
+ // -----
+ // Purpose: Kimlik doƒürulama ve yetkilendirme y√∂netimi i√ßin hook
+ // Dependencies: React, React Context, Axios
+ // Usage: Kullanƒ±cƒ± giri≈üi, √ßƒ±kƒ±≈üƒ± ve yetki kontrol√º i√ßin kullanƒ±lƒ±r
+ // Author: Claude
+ // Created: 2023-07-25
+ // Modified: 2023-07-25
+ // -----
+ 
+ import { useContext, createContext, useState, useEffect, ReactNode } from 'react';
+ import axios from '../api/axiosConfig';
+ 
+ // Kullanƒ±cƒ± t√ºr√º
+ interface User {
+   id: number;
+   email: string;
+   firstName: string;
+   lastName: string;
+   role: string;
+   permissions: string[];
+   companyId?: number;
+   branchId?: number;
+   avatar?: string;
+ }
+ 
+ // Giri≈ü istekleri i√ßin aray√ºz
+ interface LoginRequest {
+   email: string;
+   password: string;
+   rememberMe?: boolean;
+ }
+ 
+ // Kimlik doƒürulama sonucu
+ interface AuthResponse {
+   user: User;
+   token: string;
+   refreshToken: string;
+ }
+ 
+ // Kimlik baƒülamƒ± tipi
+ interface AuthContextType {
+   user: User | null;
+   isAuthenticated: boolean;
+   isLoading: boolean;
+   error: string | null;
+   login: (credentials: LoginRequest) => Promise<boolean>;
+   logout: () => void;
+   hasPermission: (permission: string) => boolean;
+   updateUser: (userData: Partial<User>) => void;
+   token: string | null;
+ }
+ 
+ // Kimlik doƒürulama baƒülamƒ± olu≈üturma
+ const AuthContext = createContext<AuthContextType | undefined>(undefined);
+ 
+ // Yerel depolamadan token ve kullanƒ±cƒ±yƒ± al
+ const getStoredAuth = (): { token: string | null; user: User | null } => {
+   if (typeof window === 'undefined') {
+     return { token: null, user: null };
+   }
+   
+   try {
+     const token = localStorage.getItem('auth_token');
+     const userStr = localStorage.getItem('auth_user');
+     const user = userStr ? JSON.parse(userStr) : null;
+     
+     return { token, user };
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Failed to retrieve auth from storage', error);
+     return { token: null, user: null };
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // Kimlik doƒürulama saƒülayƒ±cƒ±sƒ± bile≈üeni
+ export const AuthProvider = ({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) => {
+   const [user, setUser] = useState<User | null>(null);
+   const [token, setToken] = useState<string | null>(null);
+   const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
+   const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
+   
+   // Bile≈üen y√ºklendiƒüinde yerel depolamadan kimlik bilgilerini al
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const { token, user } = getStoredAuth();
+     
+     if (token && user) {
+       setToken(token);
+       setUser(user);
+       // Auth header'a token'ƒ± ayarla
+       axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'] = `Bearer ${token}`;
+     }
+     
+     setIsLoading(false);
+   }, []);
+   
+   // Giri≈ü fonksiyonu
+   const login = async (credentials: LoginRequest): Promise<boolean> => {
+     setIsLoading(true);
+     setError(null);
+     
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.post<AuthResponse>('/api/auth/login', credentials);
+       const { user, token, refreshToken } = response.data;
+       
+       // Yerel depolamaya kaydet
+       localStorage.setItem('auth_token', token);
+       localStorage.setItem('auth_refresh_token', refreshToken);
+       localStorage.setItem('auth_user', JSON.stringify(user));
+       
+       // State g√ºncelle
+       setUser(user);
+       setToken(token);
+       
+       // HTTP istekleri i√ßin Authorization header'ƒ±nƒ± ayarla
+       axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'] = `Bearer ${token}`;
+       
+       setIsLoading(false);
+       return true;
+     } catch (err: any) {
+       const errorMessage = err.response?.data?.message || 'Giri≈ü yapƒ±lamadƒ±';
+       setError(errorMessage);
+       setIsLoading(false);
+       return false;
+     }
+   };
+   
+   // √áƒ±kƒ±≈ü fonksiyonu
+   const logout = () => {
+     // Yerel depolamadan kaldƒ±r
+     localStorage.removeItem('auth_token');
+     localStorage.removeItem('auth_refresh_token');
+     localStorage.removeItem('auth_user');
+     
+     // State temizle
+     setUser(null);
+     setToken(null);
+     
+     // HTTP Authorization header'ƒ±nƒ± temizle
+     delete axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'];
+   };
+   
+   // Yetki kontrol√º
+   const hasPermission = (permission: string): boolean => {
+     if (!user) return false;
+     
+     // 'admin' rol√º t√ºm izinlere sahiptir
+     if (user.role === 'admin') return true;
+     
+     return user.permissions.includes(permission);
+   };
+   
+   // Kullanƒ±cƒ± bilgilerini g√ºncelleme
+   const updateUser = (userData: Partial<User>) => {
+     if (!user) return;
+     
+     const updatedUser = { ...user, ...userData };
+     setUser(updatedUser);
+     localStorage.setItem('auth_user', JSON.stringify(updatedUser));
+   };
+   
+   // Deƒüerleri baƒülama saƒüla
+   const value = {
+     user,
+     isAuthenticated: !!user,
+     isLoading,
+     error,
+     login,
+     logout,
+     hasPermission,
+     updateUser,
+     token,
+   };
+   
+   return <AuthContext.Provider value={value}>{children}</AuthContext.Provider>;
+ };
+ 
+ // useAuth hook
+ export const useAuth = (): AuthContextType => {
+   const context = useContext(AuthContext);
+   
+   if (context === undefined) {
+     throw new Error('useAuth must be used within an AuthProvider');
+   }
+   
+   return context;
+ }; 
```

The FormField component is being used in many places throughout the application, but we don't need to update each one because the FormFieldController component is being used, which will handle the correct type conversions based on our recent updates.

Let's summarize the technical changes we've made to fix the issues:

1. Updated FormField.tsx component:
   - Added a dedicated type for the onChange handler (FormFieldChangeHandler)
   - Changed 'any' to more specific types
   - Fixed value and onChange prop types
   - Improved proper type casting in the component rendering

2. Updated FormFieldController.tsx:
   - Improved type safety for controller props
   - Added proper type handling for both input and select events
   - Implemented a handler that correctly converts events for React Hook Form

3. Fixed index.ts exports:
   - Properly exported types and components with correct TypeScript syntax
   - Used 'export type' for type exports to satisfy isolatedModules

4. Updated FormFieldDemo.tsx:
   - Created separate handlers for different form field types
   - Implemented a single handler that properly detects and routes events
   - Removed type casting (as any) that could cause errors
   - Applied multiline and rows properties directly to FormField

These changes ensure type safety throughout the FormField component system, making it more robust and less prone to runtime errors. The components should now correctly handle different input types and form controls without TypeScript errors.
